in.srain.cube.image.impl

Class DefaultImageLoadHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • in.srain.cube.image.impl.DefaultImageLoadHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageLoadHandler

    public class DefaultImageLoadHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements ImageLoadHandler
    A simple implementation of ImageLoadHandler.

    This loader will put a background to ImageView when the image is loading.
